name: California’s Civil Rights Department State of California
description: The California Civil Rights Department (CRD) enforces many of California’s robust civil rights laws, including in the areas of employment, housing, business and public accommodations, state-funded programs and activities, professional relationships, hate violence & human trafficking. Members of the public can directly file civil rights complaints with CRD. Each year, CRD investigates thousands of complaints.
